question: As I read each of the following problems, please tell me if you think it will get better, get worse or stay the same in the next five years. d. political instability
raw_output:
I believe political instability will get worse in the next five years because many countries are currently experiencing heightened tensions, divisions, and conflicts that could escalate further if not adequately addressed. The global climate of unrest and challenges to democratic institutions make continued instability likely.

ANSWER: B
